item.title: Modularization - Real-life example
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: With a clear view on how multi-module apps should be architected, let’s dive into a real-life practical example. We’ll discover how the architecture results in a clear application structure, how navigation is handled, how to use staged rollouts, how to test everything and even look at a production app that is using this architecture.
